EmailTemplate.name: webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-03-04 NA.Invite.Prospects
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Tosca Testsuite Webinar and Demo: Risk Management Engine
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar - Tricentis Tosca Testsuite: Innovate Faster with the Risk Management Engine
Wednesday, February 26, 2014 1:00 p.m. - 2:00 p.m AEDT (Sydney)
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-02-26.html>
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
As consumer expectations for your software increase, so does the business risk inherent in your software processes.
Shorter development cycles are becoming the norm for companies racing to get products and services to market, and testing teams need a better way to minimize business-related risk.
In this 1-hour webinar, see a demo of Tricentis Tosca Testsuite and learn more about:
- The Tricentis approach to minimizing risk while delivering high quality on time and on budget
- How to leverage the knowledge of business testers to weight test cases according to business risk
- How to analyze results in real time to make sure that you’re testing what needs to be tested
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-02-26.html>
